channel.title: An IP all servers should ban
channel.description:
This person gets on peoples servers make accounts like (OWNERSNAME) Then sells mods/admins spots....
This is the ip: chtwpe01bba-142177188204.pei.aliant.net
She/he gets on saying its the owner and shes actually sold 5 admins spots and 3 mod spots as my records are showing..... Now its optional if you want to ban this one im just trying to help... My server is really popular so she tried sell it alot.
